description: It's no secret that cocktails can be loaded with calories and sugar, but that doesn't mean you have to give them up altogether. This Lemon And Ginger Mule is a&nbsp;low-calorie mule cocktail recipe that is perfect for satisfying your alcohol cravings without ruining your&nbsp;diet.Made with&nbsp;ginger beer, vodka, and lemon and ginger liqueur, this drink is both invigorating and delicious. So next time you're looking for a tasty way to enjoy a few drinks with friends, give this low-calorie cocktail recipe a try!
